user_request.sanitized: We determined while completing plan_mllc6x7s_5254485e that it is impossible to create our own custom subagent spawn tool. We need to gut the spawn tool and repurpose it to simply store context prior to spawning an agent. Agents were spawned with decent context and instructions prior to spawn tool implementation; current implementation is causing problems.

requirements: Create a new plan to remove custom spawn execution behavior
Repurpose spawn tool to context preparation/storage only
Preserve pre-spawn context quality and instructions
Use stable existing spawn path for actual agent launches
constraints: Do not rely on custom spawn tool to perform spawning
Avoid regressions to existing orchestration flows
Maintain compatibility for existing callers where practical

additional_notes.sanitized: Originating problem identified during plan_mllc6x7s_5254485e; this plan is a corrective change.
